/usr/bin/c++    -g -Wall -Wextra -Werror   CMakeFiles/run.dir/Source.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/figure.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/rectangle.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/rhombus.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/Subscriber.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/trapezoid.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/point.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/vector.cpp.o  -o run -rdynamic -lpthread
